alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 12 at 12:45AM MST until September 12 at 3:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: .The remnant circulation of Kay will move across the Desert Southwest, triggering a final round of thunderstorms with heavy rain. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following area, Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Several rounds of thunderstorms with heavy rain will move north across southern Mohave County through early this morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
